description.zh: 简单的格式化工具栏，数组写法工具栏在 RichText 组件内，外层包裹需考虑工具栏高度。
description.en: Simply format the toolbar. The array format toolbar is in the RichText component, and the height of the toolbar should be considered for the outer wrapper.

node.html:
RichText

Property Description Type Default Value
options Editor configuration, see Quill Options object
mode Editor mode, optional value editor preview string editor
toolbar Toolbar, optional value is hook or built-in type: normal none string ({ dataSet, id }) => ReactNode

For more attributes, please refer to FormField.

RichText.RichTextViewer

Parameters Description Type Default Value
deltaOps Editor rendering value Delta.ops None

toolbar

  • Custom Toolbar Document Custom Toolbar

pageContext.description:
Rich text editor.
